failure.message: failed Adding a pdf asset to an object

testcase.failure:
Scenario: Adding a pdf asset to an object
Given I am logged in as "user1" in the group "cm" Given I have created a pdfdoc object Then I should see a link to edit an object When I follow the link to edit an object And I attach the asset file "sample_pdf.pdf" And I press the button to upload a file Then I should see a success message for file upload
Message:
Timed out waiting for response to {"name":"click","args":[212,1]}. It's possible that this happened because something took a very long time (for example a page load was slow). If so, setting the Poltergeist :timeout option to a higher value will help (see the docs for details). If increasing the timeout does not help, this is probably a bug in Poltergeist - please report it to the issue tracker. (Capybara::Poltergeist::TimeoutError) ./features/step_definitions/web_steps.rb:190:in `/^(?:|I )press the button to (.+)$/' features/web_construct_object.feature:72:in `And I press the button to upload a file'
